meanings.definition: To design something better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She outdesigned her friend by creating a more colorful poster.
meanings.sent2: The new architect outdesigned the old one with a more efficient building layout.
meanings.sent3: The student outdesigned the teacher's lesson plan with a creative project.
meanings.sent4: Her innovative approach outdesigned all previous attempts at solving the problem.
meanings.sent5: The young artist outdesigned the experienced designer with her unique style.

meanings.sent1: The new phone model outdesigned the previous one with its sleek design.
meanings.sent2: Her dress outdesigned all the others at the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The cat outdesigned the dog in the costume contest with its adorable outfit.
meanings.sent4: The new logo outdesigned the old one, making the company stand out.
meanings.sent5: The talented chef outdesigned her competitors with a creative dish presentation.

meanings.sent1: The young designer outdesigned the established brand with her fresh ideas.
meanings.sent2: His artwork outdesigned all the others in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The team outdesigned their rivals with a unique marketing campaign.
meanings.sent4: The new car model outdesigned the competition, attracting more buyers.
meanings.sent5: The student outdesigned the teacher's expectations with a stunning project.
